scripts.export: rm -rf ../next-static-site && next export -o ../next-static-site && cd ../next-static-site && git init && git remote add origin https://github.com/geoseong/nextjs-study.git
scripts.deploy:static: npm run build && next export -o ../next-static-site && aws s3 cp ../next-static-site s3://nextjs-test-geoseong --recursive --acl public-read --profile 404hunter-geoseong
